content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Greetings, Aziz. Thank you for considering my apartment for rental. I understand that you are looking for a reasonable and fair price, but as the landlord, I want to maximize my gains. Based on my research and market analysis, I believe that a rental price of 800 Euros per month would be competitive and reasonable. Would you be willing to consider this price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
NO, 800 Euros is too high. Can you lower the price?

I would like to negotiate a rental price of 600 Euros per month.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: I understand your concerns, Aziz. While I do want to maximize my gains as a landlord, I am also willing to be fair and reasonable in our negotiations. Based on your proposed rental price of 600 Euros per month, I am willing to agree to this price. I believe it is a fair and competitive rate in the current market. Is there anything else we need to discuss before we can finalize the rental agreement?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
NO, thank you. I agree to the price of 600 Euros per month. Let's sign the rental agreement.

Thank you for your cooperation, Mister Heine.

TERMINATE.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you, Aziz. I am glad that we were able to come to an agreement on the rental price. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and your cooperation in signing the rental agreement. If you have any further questions or concerns in the future, please do not hesitate to reach out to me. Have a great day!
name: Heinrich Heine
